author: kkolinko
msg: Align Commons Daemon options between service.bat and exe installer
--StartPath, --StopPath (They should be unnecessary in --StartMode jvm, but exe installed sets them and they are visible and settable in configuration dialog)
--Classpath change mentioned in changelog was in r1568780
--LogPath fix from r1568779 was applied to exe installer as well.
